genresAdvancedInfo.name: assamese hip hop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: A subgenre of hip hop music that originated in the Indian state of Assam. It blends traditional Assamese folk music with contemporary hip hop beats and lyrics. Assamese hip hop is known for its socially conscious themes, addressing issues such as poverty, corruption, and social injustice. It has gained popularity in recent years, especially among the younger generation.
